description: This is a C++ unit test file for the class OptionalType, utilizing Google Test framework. The tests validate the behavior of OptionalType instances, including construction, assignment, comparison, and value access.

classes.name: OptionalType
classes.description: A template class that models an optional value, supporting methods like Clear(), IsSet(), Value(), and comparison operators.

methods.name: operator
methods.description: Conversion operator to get the contained value.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Clears the optional value, setting it to unset.

methods.name: IsSet
methods.description: Checks if the optional has a value set.
